thread.title: Plaza Premium Lounge launches Power Breakfast for business travellers at LHR T2 Arrivals
thread.title_full: Plaza Premium Lounge launches Power Breakfast for business travellers at LHR T2 Arrivals

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Plaza Premium Lounge launches Power Breakfast for business travellers at LHR T2 Arrivals
text:
Plaza Premium Lounge launches Power Breakfast for business travellers at LHR T2 Arrivals Plaza Premium Lounge launches Power Breakfast for business travellers at LHR T2 Arrivals Details Category: Airport & Airline   15:45 For this summer, the Arrivals Lounge at Terminal 2 has launched a new Power Breakfast designed to help business travellers hit the ground running after arriving in London on a long-haul red-eye flight early in the morning. 
The Power Breakfast at Plaza Premium Lounge Terminal 2 Arrivals includes a reviving shower and a healthy and nutritious breakfast, the best way to kick-start a busy day and freshen up after a flight. The stylish and contemporary Arrivals lounge has plenty of space to relax or work while connectivity is key with complimentary Wi-Fi throughout and plenty of plug sockets for tablets, laptops and mobile phones. Business travellers will enjoy the positive benefits of the Plaza Premium Lounge Power Breakfast throughout the day before they check-in to their hotel, head home or travel back to the airport for their onward journey. Plaza Premium Lounge Power Breakfast starts from £25 for one hour’s access and includes lounge access, a shower, breakfast and WiFi. Related articles
